automenta.vivisect.swing.property.swing.plaf.basic

Class BasicLookAndFeelAddons

  • java.lang.Object
    • automenta.vivisect.swing.property.swing.plaf.LookAndFeelAddons
      • automenta.vivisect.swing.property.swing.plaf.basic.BasicLookAndFeelAddons
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AquaLookAndFeelAddons, MetalLookAndFeelAddons, MotifLookAndFeelAddons, WindowsLookAndFeelAddons

    public class BasicLookAndFeelAddons
extends LookAndFeelAddons
    Install simple pluggable UI. Usually not used directly, subclasses should be preferred as this addon may not provide complete implementation of the additionnal pluggable UIs.
